statement.p: If one shop can do 5 float changes in two days, and a second shop can do 11 float changes in three days, how long will it take the pair of shops to do 78 float changes?
If they start on Monday and work only weekdays, on what day of the week will they finish?

solution.p: First we need to add the rates to obtain the total rate.
Now we can setup the proportion to answer the question.
\displaystyle{13}\approx{N} to indicate on how many days work was done.
13 days is 2 weeks and 3 additional days. Thus the final day will be Thursday.
